reference.title: epub.generate.css.font.rules Ant parameter
reference.shortdesc: Indicates whether or not to generate CSS @font-face rules using the configuration details specified a font manifest.

section.p: The name and location of the generated CSS file is configured in the font-manifest file specified at runtime.

dlentry.dd: Generate a CSS fragment containing @font-face rules as defined in the font manifest.
Do not generate a @font-face CSS fragment.
